channel.title: Fortress Forever 4vs4 Cash Prize Tourney!
channel.description:
Just ran across this today. Fortress Forever (remake of TFC classic) is having a 4x4 contest paying cash to winners.
The top tier teams will be competing for $800 The low tier teams will be competing for $200
Looks like it begins Feb 1 so, if you use to be good at TFC Classic then here's your chance to win some bucks.
I use to play this and really enjoyed it but, got older and kind of gave up on it.
Anyway, for those who are interested, here's the link for info: [url]https://forums.fortress-forever.com/showthread.php?t=23658[/url]

item.title: Fortress Forever 4vs4 Cash Prize Tourney!
item.dc:creator: stoneage
item.description:
I was top tier player back in the day. Although I’m sure I wouldn’t be that amazing now. I’d be down to join a team if anyone here is thinking of making one.

Read full topic
